input: Prepare a batch request for multiple contracts focusing on payment card sequence and character details for UUIDs 11223344-5566-7788-99aa-bbccddeeff00 and 55667788-99aa-bbcc-ddee-ff1122334455.

output.body:
--request-separator
Content-Type: application/http
Content-Transfer-Encoding: binary

GET /BankCardContracts/11223344-5566-7788-99aa-bbccddeeff00?$select=PaymentCardSequenceID,PaymentCardCharacterName HTTP/1.1
Accept: application/json

--request-separator
Content-Type: application/http
Content-Transfer-Encoding: binary

GET /BankCardContracts/55667788-99aa-bbcc-ddee-ff1122334455?$select=PaymentCardSequenceID,PaymentCardCharacterName HTTP/1.1
Accept: application/json

--request-separator--
